explanation: Funds are required for the reimbursement of transportation services, replacement of body armor, and reimbursement of miscellaneous repair parts and supplies related to CBRNE gear, weapons, communications equipment, and other equipment components provided to Ukraine or identified and notified to Congress through this reprogramming action for provision to the Government of Ukraine in support of the international effort to counter Russian aggression. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

explanation: Funds are for the reimbursement of transportation services and procurement of replacement of light tactical all-terrain vehicles (LTATV) MRZR Alpha , Diesel, 4 seat identified and notified to Congress through this reprogramming action for provision to the Government of Ukraine in support of the international effort to counter Russian aggression. Funds are available from the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, 24/25, appropriation for replacement of defense articles from the stocks of the Department of Defense and reimbursement for defense services from the Department of Defense, which have been provided to the Government of Ukraine or identified and notified to Congress through this reprogramming action for provision to the Government of, Ukraine under Presidential Drawdown Authority. This is emergency budget funding.
